moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Manage Hosts File Injection
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module allows the attacker to insert a new entry into the target
        system's hosts file.
author: vt <nick.freeman@security-assessment.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: DOMAIN
options.description: Domain name for host file manipulation.

options.name: IP
options.description: IP address to point domain name to.
